entry.title: Saturday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing drizzle or ice pellets and ending late this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries or ice pellets. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Ice pellets beginning late in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets or freezing rain. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Ice pellets changing to freezing rain late in the evening then to rain after midnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 14 January 2023
